overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by physical presence (more than 183 days) or economic interests.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Basic personal allowance of UYU 13,412 per month.
personal_income_tax.social_security: Around 15% of salary (shared between employer and employee).

corporate_tax.small_business_rate: Reduced rates available for small businesses.

capital_gains_tax.rate: 12% on capital gains from the sale of real estate and financial assets.
capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt.
capital_gains_tax.indexation: Inflation adjustment is allowed for calculating capital gains.

vat_gst.reduced_rate: 10% on certain goods and services (e.g., food, medicine).

property_tax.exemptions: Primary residence and rural properties may be eligible for exemptions.

inheritance_tax.exemptions: Spouse, direct descendants, and charitable donations.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Minimum income of around UYU 2,000,000 per year.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Personal income tax exemption for foreign income.
digital_nomad_visa.duration: Renewable for up to three years.

special_economic_zones.name: Zona Franca de Nueva Palmira (ZFN)
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Exemption from corporate tax, VAT, and import duties.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: No specific regulations, may be taxed as personal income.
crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: No specific regulations, may be taxed as capital gains.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: No specific regulations, may be taxed as personal income.
nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: No specific regulations, may be taxed as capital gains.

additional_notes.political_risks: Uruguay's political environment is generally stable.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Uruguay's economy is relatively stable with low inflation and a strong currency.
additional_notes.legal_system: Uruguay has a well-developed legal system with a strong emphasis on transparency and efficiency.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 84th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
